Table: lexicon

A lexicon is a list of terms which correspond to GCIS identifiers.

lexicon Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

A brief descriptive identifier for this lexicon.
description character varying

A description of the lexicon, possibly including the organization associated with it.
url character varying

A url for further information.

 

lexicon Constraints
Name Constraint
lexicon_identifier_check CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

context
exterm
